properties.name: encode_with_plus_sign
properties.description: select true to encode with plus sign over %20 for space

properties.script:
import urllib.parse, sys
query = sys.argv[1]
plus_sign = sys.argv[2]
if plus_sign == "true":
   output = urllib.parse.quote_plus(query)
else:
   output = urllib.parse.quote(query)
output_len = len(output)
